providers.description: Specifies the provider object. Only necessary when using a third party split. If not, you´ll need to complete the rest of the recipient fields.

recipient_id.description: The unique identifier of the provider's recipient.

id.description: The unique identifier of the provider.

merchant_recipient_id.description: The unique identifier of the recipient defined by the merchant.

legal_name.description: The recipient's name. (Max: 80) Only necessary when national entity is ENTITY.

document.description: Specifies the recipient's document object, including its number and type.

document_type.description: The recipient's document type (MAX 6, MIN 2; [Document Type List](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#document-type-list)).

phone.description: Specifies the recipient's phone number object.

country_code.description: The country code of the recipient's phone (MAX 3; MIN 2).

number.description: The recipient's phone number, without the country code (MAX 32; MIN 1).

address.description: Specifies the recipient's billing address object.

address_line_1.description: The primary billing address line of the recipient (MAX 255; MIN 3).

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the recipient (MAX 255; MIN 3).

city.description: The city considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

country.description: The country considered for the billing address (MAX 2; MIN 2; [ISO 3166-1](https://docs.y.uno/reference/customer-object#country-code-list-iso-3166-1)).

state.description: The state considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3).

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the billing address (MAX 11; MIN 4).

withdrawal_methods.description: Specifies the recipient's withdrawal methods object.

bank.description: Specifies the recipient's bank account information.

country.description: The bank account's country (ISO 3166-1 MAX 2; MIN 2).

currency.description: The bank account's currency (ISO 3166-1 MAX 3; MIN 3).

callback_url.description: URL to redirect customer after onboarding process.

details.message: Email must be a valid email address
Document number must be between 3 and 40 characters

value.message: Document type CC is not valid for country BR

content.description: File's content with Base 64 encoded format. PDF

value.message: The provided document type is not supported

account_id.description: Unique id of the account in Yuno (MAX 64; MIN 36).

merchant_recipient_id.description: Unique identifier of the recipient defined by the merchant (MAX 255; MIN 1)

national_entity.description: Beneficiary's national entity type. Could be INDIVIDUAL or ENTITY

legal_name.description: Beneficiary's name. (MAX 80; MIN 1) Only necessary when national entity is ENTITY

country_code.description: Beneficiary's cell phone area code. (MAX 3; MIN 2)

address_line_1.description: The primary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3)

address_line_2.description: The secondary billing address line of the customer (MAX 255; MIN 3)

city.description: The city considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3)

state.description: The state / province considered for the billing address (MAX 255; MIN 3)

zip_code.description: The zipcode considered for the billing address (MAX 11; MIN 4)

file_name.description: The name of the documentation sent (MAX 255; MIN 3).

content_type.description: The type of the documentation sent by the merchant

content_category.description: The category of the documentation sent by the merchant

content.description: The content of the documentation sent by the merchant encoded in base64. Max size: 1MB.

account_type.description: Beneficiary's bank account type (MAX 1; MIN 3). Could be: CHECKINGS, SAVINGS

country.description: The bank account's country (ISO 3166-1 MAX 2; MIN 2)

currency.description: The bank account's currency (ISO 3166-1 MAX 3; MIN 3)

type.description: Type of onboarding. If its done by Yuno

callback_url.description: URL in case to redirect your customer after the onboarding process with the provider, if needed. (MAX 255; MIN 1).
